link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK(File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 开发 targetSdk 35 (Android 15)
  2. 改进 搜索界面中显示底部滑动面板
  3. 改进 版本迁移用户界面
  4. 改进 启用新的系统返回手势动画 (Android T及以上)
  5. 改进 边到边界面
  6. 删除 设置项“着色导航栏”（已无意义）
  7. 修改 默认着色导航栏
  8. 修改 若可行，透明或半透明导航栏
  9. 修改 默认文件播放列表图标
  10. 修改 禁止从 v1.4.0 之前的版本升级, 警告从 v1.7.0 之前的版本升级
  11. 翻译 更新 波兰语（Cooky）、巴西葡萄牙语（FalaTudo）
  12. 开发 更新依赖
releaseNote.en:
1. Development: Targeting SDK 35 (Android 15)
  2. Improve: show bottom sliding panel in Search
  3. Improve: explicit user interface for version migration
  4. Improve: enable new system back gesture animations for Android T and above
  5. Improve: edge to edge user interface
  6. Remove: preference "colored navigation bar" (not applicable now)
  7. Modify: navigation bar would always be colored by default
  8. Modify: navigation bar would be transparent or translucent if possible now
  9. Modify: change default File Playlist icon
  10. Modify: forbid upgrading from prior to v1.4.0 & warn upgrading from prior to v1.7.0
  11. Translation: update Polish (cooky), Portuguese Brazilian (by FalaTudo)
  12. Development: update dependencies

link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK(File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 播放列表图标
  2. 修复 有时无法进入专辑界面
  3. 修复 从后台启动时可能的崩溃
  4. 修复 读写某些文件的音乐标签时崩溃
  5. 修复 在标签编辑器中处理超长标签时卡死或崩溃
  6. 修复 更改后播放列表有时不会自动更新
  7. 修复 使用 SAF 删除播放列表时选择错误目录将会崩溃
  8. 修复 在搜索结果、专辑详情、艺术家详情、流派详情中，向播放列表增添歌曲时崩溃
  9. 修复 退出多选模式时行为异常
  10. 修复 当邻近文件选项卡时无法正常退出应用程序
  11. 修复 设备重启后应用小部件中的图像不刷新
  12. 修复 直至完全载入前专辑界面图片空白
  13. 修改 Android N 上，不再开机自启服务，倘若存在任何小组件时
  14. 改进 在某些设备上专辑中曲目编号的排序顺序
  15. 改进 创建、复制或操纵播放列表的流程
  16. 改进 lrc格式歌词识别
  17. 翻译 更新 波兰语(cooky), 西班牙语 (Dino RTX (rtxdino36))
  18. 开发 使用 SDK 35 编译
  19. 开发 升级 Gradle 至 8.10.2, 升级 AGP 至 8.7.5, 升级 kotlin 至 2.0.21
  20. 开发 升级 Jetpack Compose 至 1.7.5, 更新依赖
  21. 开发 清理代码
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: regression of playlist icons
  2. Fix: sometimes could not enter Album Detail
  3. Fix: possibly crash when starting from background
  4. Fix: crash when reading or editing tags of some certain files
  5. Fix: frozen or crash when processing extremely long tags in Tag Editor
  6. Fix: sometimes playlists would not be automatically updated after changing
  7. Fix: crash when deleting playlists using SAF but selecting the wrong directory
  8. Fix: crash when adding songs to a playlist in Search Results, Album Detail, Artist Detail, Genre Detail
  9. Fix: unexpected behaviors when dismissing multi-selection actionbar
  10. Fix: could not exit application properly when Files tab nearby
  11. Fix: blank images in App Widgets after device rebooting
  12. Fix: blank images in Album Detail util fully loaded
  13. Modify: no longer start service after device booting on Android N if any AppWidget exists
  14. Improve: sort order of track number in the album on some devices
  15. Improve: user experience on manipulating playlists
  16. Improve: lrc format lyric detection
  17. Translation: update Polish (cooky), Spanish (by Dino RTX (rtxdino36))
  18. Development: compile with SDK 35
  19. Development: upgrade Gradle to 8.10.2, upgrade AGP to 8.7.2, upgrade kotlin to 2.0.21
  20. Development: upgrade Jetpack Compose to 1.7.5, update dependencies
  21. Development: cleanup code
